subject: Golf
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Known as Mighty Mite, Danoff was a top amateur golfer before turning pro in 1949 and starting the Ladies Professional Golf Association with 12 others in 1950.
snippet: Known as Mighty Mite, Danoff was a top amateur golfer before turning pro in 1949 and starting the Ladies Professional Golf Association with 12 others in 1950.
